Comments_List: I learned a vast array of not only speaking the Indonesian language, but of Indonesian culture as well. The varying class activities to learn about Indonesia really helped me learn a lot, and enjoy this class.

The strength of this course is the teacher and the material she presented. This was by far my favorite class at Yale, and the Indonesian class I was in had a family environment supported by our teacher and fostered an awesome learning environment.
Yes absolutely. On top of being a very interesting language and culture, the teacher is awesome and my favorite at Yale.
